channel.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada - Latest Releases
channel.description: The latest news related to Distributed Proofreaders Canada

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, October 3rd, 2012
item.description:
P3 proofers, now it's your turn to do your part for our Anniversary Project: The Canadian North-west (1885).
----------------

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Sunday, September 30th, 2012
Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Sunday, September 30th, 2012
Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, August 29th, 2012
item.description:
P3 Quals Help Wanted
Nothing at this time. But do keep checking back -- we really do appreciate your assistance.
-----------------------------------

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, August 29th, 2012
item.description: The revised version 4.0 of the Proofreading Guidelines are now in the wiki at FAQ Proofreading Guidelines. They come into effect October 1 2012, and will be considered as the basis for P3 applications.

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Sunday, July 29th, 2012
item.description:
This is a link to Faded Page, our companion website that will display all of our eBooks, and will eventually host many eBooks from other sources, too.
FadedPage
-----------------------

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Sunday, May 13th, 2012
item.description: Hey!! go and take a look at the latest version of Faded Page. I think you'll really like its appearance and content. Needless to say, Roger is doing a great job!!! ---------------------------

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Thursday, February 9th, 2012
item.description:
Please visit the amazing tutorial on "sand-bagging" (an advanced image-wrangling technique) created by PhotoMatt.
The link is Sand-Bagging.

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, September 21st, 2011
item.description: The revised version 2.0 of the Formatting Guidelines is now in the wiki at FAQ Formatting Guidelines. They came into effect as of June 1, 2012, and will be considered as the basis for F2 applications.

item.title: Distributed Proofreaders Canada News Update for Wednesday, September 21st, 2011
item.description: The revised version 2.0 of the Formatting Guidelines is now in the wiki at FAQ Formatting Guidelines. They came into effect as of June 1, 2012, and will be considered as the basis for F2 applications.
